headline: Delta Cargo implements IBS Software's full iCargo Solution for future ready transformation
summary: Delta Cargo, the air freight division of Delta Air Lines, has successfully implemented IBS Software's full iCargo product suite, as part of its digital transformation and innovation journey. Delta Cargo has migrated from a nearly 30-year-old legacy system and adopted the iCargo platform, modernising operations across their 252 worldwide cargo stations, and enhancing their service experience for over 6,500 users.
